title: Was working great until this week
text: Haven‚Äôt had a problem with it but just contacted their app support- I noticed that new content wasn‚Äôt uploading- constant spinning status bar so I uninstalled it.. now I can‚Äôt even input my mobile number- it says to check my internet connection which is fine.. hopefully will get resolved soon.. fixed!! I had to turn off my VPN, install it, then turn my VPN back on‚Ä¶ would of been nice to get a prompt as to why it wouldn‚Äôt work

title: Love it, but hate that it says I have a message when I don‚Äôt
text: I use this for my coaching business to communicate with my clients but every time I get a message the notification stays up even after I‚Äôve checked it. My clients have noticed the same thing. I would greatly appreciate this glitch being fixed so it looks more professional and so I don‚Äôt have to fully turn off notifications. All in all love everything else especially the video feature. üëèüèΩ

title: 9.6 problem with Proxies
text:
Hi guys 
I have a problem with my last version of telegram9.6. I use proxy to connect and when I click on one these proxies it jumps out and when i want to open the app again it jumps out too. It‚Äôs like a crash problem or something like that. When I want to solve it I have to delete the app and again download it..
It must be the last update problem
What is the right solution?

title: Favorite App Ruined By Premium
text: I use this app everyday, 24/7, it‚Äôs the only way I keep in touch with friends. I was recently gifted premium by a well-meaning friend and I CANNOT stand the premium features. All kinds of new pop-ups any time I‚Äôm typing, insane seizure-inducing stickers that I DO NOT care about or think are cool, I can‚Äôt turn the premium badge OFF so now it‚Äôs just floating at the end of my name. I didn‚Äôt ask for this and support won‚Äôt respond, looked online for more info and am becoming despondent as it sinks in for 12months this junk I DIDNT WANT OR ASK FOR is just stuck with me. TG team if ur reading this HELP‚Äî it is insane that the badge cannot be hidden and all this other emoji stuff too.

title: Delete a msg
text: This is my favorite app, BUT lately on a few chats we‚Äôre unable to delete our message! It‚Äôs very frustrating sometimes. I was hoping the update would correct that but, no.. üòû for example, on one chat we post items at quite a discount for locals (online garage sale‚Äôing), but once we get rid of the items we‚Äôre supposed to delete them to keep the check clean. This makes far more work for the admin‚Äôs which aren‚Äôt always available.

title: Terrible Update
text: The latest update has a very annoying notification bug and a huge privacy/security issue. Badges are not clearing after messages are read which is frustrating but I can honestly deal with that. My biggest complaint about this update though is the fact that banners and alerts now show profile pictures with no way to disable them even if the ‚ÄúNames on Lock Screen‚Äù setting is turned off. If I have that setting off, the app should not be showing any sort of identifiable information on notifications. I don‚Äôt know how no one at Telegram took this into consideration but it needs to be fixed ASAP!

title: More areas of opportunity
text:
I‚Äôve loved Telegram since day 1, even if the following things don‚Äôt get changed/added, I will always use Telegram instead of Whatsapp 

Suggestions/Requests:

1. Let us pin more conversations: I have multiple family groups that I would love to have pinned to the top of my list or chats. 

2. Export conversations in an easy way: I have conversations with my mother who past away last year that I would love to export, including the photos. 

3. Allow us to put a picture or icon on users on our contact list who don‚Äôt have a picture on their profile. 

4. Replace the stickers with something else. A lot of us dislike the stickers and their integration to the app. Do what iMessage does it great. Integrate other apps or options: emojis, gifs etc. 

That‚Äôs all for now. Hope someone responds.

title: Black Screen
text: Hi! On the bottom of the bar next to the text box, there's a button that you can switch between voice message or a mini video. Unfortunately, since the new update, each time I try to play it back, the screen will turn black and flicker from normal to black for a few seconds as the video plays. When I try to leave the app, the screen will turn black one last time since the video still plays for a few seconds when exiting the app. Thanks guys, keep up the awesome work!

title: Sudden App Crash
text:
I‚Äôve been using Telegram for so many years now and I would‚Äôve given it 5 starts, but recently, after updating to iOS 16 to be precise, I‚Äôve been having issues with the app. It suddenly crashes and nothing works! I have to close and reopen the app, which in this case, takes twice longer to load everything than when I first open the app. 
I don‚Äôt know if this is a problem with iOS 16 or if older iPhone users are experiencing such issue (I own an iPhone 8). 
Please take this into consideration. Thanks.

title: Problem connecting after the recent update
text:
Telegram is one of the most underrated messengers out there. It has excellent, innovative features and has ben working great ever since I joined the app. 
The recent update is causing some problems though. I searched online and found out multiple users have been having the same problem with this version. It either gets stuck on "Connecting" or on "Updating".

title: Limited to mutual contacts
text: I never write reviews. But the sole purpose of Telegram for me was business development. I belong to groups within my industry that allows for making new connections. However, Telegram, for no apparent reason, has flagged me for spam and has limited my account to only allow sending messages to someone who is already in my contact list. Essentially making this app useless. I‚Äôve never sent spam. They have a spam bot in which you can say ‚ÄúI‚Äôve never sent spam‚Äù...but nobody answers. I‚Äôve tried contacting their support team, but no one replies. One star until someone actually speaks with me from the company and explains exactly what happened and lifts this limitation from my account.

title: Ability to label secret chats would be very helpful
text: This app is great. It would great if secret chats could be labeled. My friend and I use this app between our phones, Macs, and I use it on iPad. When I try to message my friend, I just sort have guess which chat might to go to his Mac and which goes to phone. He has to ask me to switch another secret chat that sends to his Mac. I‚Äôd like to be able to label that secret as ‚ÄòMac Chat‚Äô and the other ‚ÄòPhone Chat‚Äô so I can tell them apart. Of course, he will have to tell me to switch, but a labeling ability would great.

title: What happened?
text:
One of the best apps Messaging apps I‚Äôve ever used. Been using Telegram for a few years now and it beats all the others.

However, what on earth is going on? Ever since iOS 15 came out I have had the same issue on two different iPhones. If I hit the paper clip to share a photo or video, the app freezes and never correct itself. You have to close the app to then use it again. 
Only way to send a photo or video is the do it through the photos app.

title: IT'S NOT A SECURE MESSENGER. DON'T USE IT.
text:
I had two accounts registered on two different phone numbers.
In August, without giving any reasons, I was blocked first one account. In September the account was unblocked, but all correspondence, all chats, all saved messages were irrevocably deleted.
In October I was blocked a second account, a business account. All contacts with clients, all business correspondence, everything is lost. No one is responding from support.
To date, the account is blocked.
The problem with Telegram is that you as a user have no tools to contact support. No one will answer you wherever you write. If, for example, in WhatsApp I contact the support without any problems and they answer me, in the case of Telegram it is impossible. You are nobody for them.
Pavel Durov, the owner of Telegram, never learned how to create a company
customer-centric. You are a commodity to him.  If you want to risk your own, register in Telegram, but remember that at any moment you will be deleted and will not be remembered.

title: Privacy for profile pic
text:
First of all let us know which one of our contacts are already in exception for "never share with" profile photo, when you scroll through contacts you cannot find.
Secondly let us choose contacts base on company. I don't want any of my company which I already saved people based on company see my profile picture.
At the end thanks for your awesome app

title: Best app
text: No censorship like Facebook and google products. No monitoring of people messages and activity like Facebook compliance. No islamophobia or Russophobia like at Facebook and google. Just signup with your number and enjoy free speech and talking to people. Facebook products have become tools used against the people, politicized which defeat their original  purpose. I switched to telegram and I will switch to Twitter when Elon musk buys it and close my Facebook accounts.

title: Not too bad or too good
text: It‚Äôs like WhatsApp‚Äôs cousin brother, but may be a bit secured although not sure where security comes from when the first thing it does is notifying all the contacts on your phone who has this app. It is an option but it shouldn‚Äôt notify at first when the app is being opened. It should leave it off unless an individual chooses to notify contacts. As some people may like privacy. Again, not too bad or too good.

title: Secure yet Dangerous
text:
While this app seemed to be very efficient for messaging which is always great but at the same time leaves you opened to be targeted by scammers (which I was) because they know with this apps secure network can‚Äôt be traced back to them. 
Be aware that scammers are also post fake job post on major platforms like indeed, LinkedIn and Glassdoor. Which is is how I believe was the main source of contact at first then they ask you to download this app. While it‚Äôs great to want to keep people‚Äôs information private I also believe it makes it harder for the proper authorities to catch the ones scamming.

title: Timer on photos and specific chats are gone
text: The old Telegram had the most amazing feature. Which helped a lot in off the record conversation. Now you need to go and make a completely new ‚Äúsecret chat for it‚Äù it was so convenient to continue talking in the same window then click a timer on that moment of the conversation where the chats disappear. Please bring back timer options in regular chats and sharing pictures.

title: Millie accessible.
text: This app is very accessible! Unfortunately, you can‚Äôt delete messages, because voiceover freezes and sometimes crashes. I hope it gets fixed in the next update. Also, could you add in the actions roder? This will make it easier for you to delete messages in addition to pressing the edit button. You can flick up and down with one finger to select an action, for example, read, delete, and delete all.

title: Crashes and Translation Glitches
text:
The app would be wonderful if it weren‚Äôt for two specific and very annoying issues: gifs crashing the app at times, and translation issues.

The crashing usually happens on the gif search page but also happens if two people post gifs at same time. 

The translation issue bothers me a lot, because it wouldn‚Äôt be that hard to fix. Half the time, the stupid app is trying to translate a Spanish message as Italian or polish. Ignoring translations for Italian and polish don‚Äôt work.

title: By far my favorite IM app.
text:
First off, the only reason I did not give this three stars is this: I really hate the fact that this app relies solely on your phone number, and that when I choose NOT to sync it with contacts, people FROM my contacts can still search me and find me somehow..? Do I have to block all my contact numbers? That‚Äôs ridiculous.

Other than that, the app is great. The stickers are beautiful, the ability to choose your background is great, the dark color scheme is fantastic‚Ä¶ Telegram is honestly great.

title: About other sessions
text:
I like the Telegram app.  It is a good application .But I think the weak point of Telegram is that the same number of Telegram accounts can be run on another device.  So that the privacy of the chat does not remain.  Anyone can abuse it.  You should solve about it.  Like any other application any application must be activated in that new instrument and automatically deactivated in the old instrument.  Otherwise you are smart all the people who created this app
Thank you

Only see the comment box with a blurred image of the sticker telling me it‚Äôs an animated stickerüôÑAlso the sound notification doesn‚Äôt always work. title: Illegal Pornography
text: You allow on your app to show pornographic content without women‚Äôs consent and it is stated by law that without the effective consent of the depicted person, the person intentionally discloses visual material depicting another person with the person‚Äôs intimate parts exposed or engaged in sexual conduct so therefore your app is engaged in illegal exposure to women and that is also considered revenge porn which is also illegal. If your app does not wish to have any further consequences I suggest you take a closer look as to the people who use your app to fix the bugs that somehow allow illegal actions or I myself will take further action to have your app completely removed.

title: Love the app but‚Ä¶.
text: It‚Äôs a great app been using it for years but I personally hate the new ‚Äústory‚Äù thing they have added. They really need to add a way to disable stories so you don‚Äôt have to see them or get alerts. Yes you can remove contacts for so you don‚Äôt get theirs but you are still stuck getting telegrams itself at the top. It‚Äôs now a well liked feature and they really need to give the ability for those who don‚Äôt want it a way to turn it off

title: Great app, but annoyingly embeds itself into the contacts app on iOS
text:
I love telegram, and use it for keeping up with friends in a more convenient manner than texts.

But it has an annoying habit of embedding itself into IOS. I have denied it every permission I can and every setting in the app itself.

But if I go to my iOS contacts, and tap on a name, tap on the voice call icon the first item on the pop up menu is telegram, not my phone. Why?! It‚Äôs denied access to my contacts... it shouldn‚Äôt be in the call list for them.

title: Block feature
text:
The block and mute features needs to be extended to not only group chat owners, but also to the chat members as well. Cause group chat owners and moderators can‚Äôt get to everything and regular users can block and mute, but it doesn‚Äôt stick.  We can still see people we‚Äôve blocked and muted. 

Please fix this!!! It‚Äôs very frustrating to be bullied and mocked and not be able to block and mute.

title: Please add reactions
text: I love this app and I push all my friends to use it. But in a group chat We would really really like the ability to react to messages other ppl sent. It‚Äôs really useful in a large chat because ppl often don‚Äôt know what to reply or don‚Äôt want to send a message for a simple reaction and this can make a chat group feel like it‚Äôs dead. I‚Äôm convince that adding reaction with help keep more ppl active on this app.

title: Audio Player Controls?
text: As a manager, Telegram has been really useful to my musicians and I for sending song files back and forth in an uncompressed manner. However, lately, it seems like the music player & playlist controls have disappeared from the app, which were integral to my usage behaviors. In addition to that, now some WAV files seem to not load anymore. If I can‚Äôt load the files my musicians send me, I‚Äôll have no choice but to use a different app. Is there a glitch or something right now with audio?

title: Good but there‚Äôs a bug
text: I‚Äôve been using this app for 7 years now and it never disappoints me and it gets even better with the cool updates and new feature but there‚Äôs just this bug that I discovered recently and it‚Äôs been annoying me ever since, the saved gifs can‚Äôt be deleted. There‚Äôs the delete option that i use it and the gif disappears but the next time open telegram and i see that it‚Äôs back again. I would really appreciate it if u fix that as soon as possible:)

title: 2 minor bugs with this version
text:
Hello. I spotted two very minor bugs with this version (5.11) of the Telegram app.

First bug: there is a dead ‚ÄúPrivacy Policy‚Äù link. If the user disables access to contacts, the app will display a page which leads the user out of the app and to the settings area of the iOS device. In this page there is a ‚ÄúPrivacy Policy‚Äù link. Clicking on this link does nothing - it is a dead link.

Second bug: when the user disables camera access, they are still able to bring up a black camera screen. This is a common feature with many iOS apps - you aren‚Äôt accessing the camera of the device, but you are displaying the flash, camera button, and forward-facing camera option on a black screen. In this screen, if the user presses the forward-facing camera icon, the app will become completely frozen. 

Please fix both of these bugs, if possible. Thank you.

title: Great app to develop classes for teaching and streaming links
text: Streaming links are always shared between people so we love to use this app to share to our customers and friends our new drops for our shoe business. It‚Äôs very fun how they had the idea to develop such a fun app with all the technology we need. Good job telegram!! I love this app and good job to my customers as well! title: Simple and easy to use and also stands up to Big Government censorship
text: Ive been using this app for a very long time and it has always been a breeze to use. There are tons of channels of which are places to get actual information about what is going on in the world, completely bypassing MSM and Government censorship. Also the app does not force you to pay to use stickers or animated stickers like Twitch or Discord do.

title: No Text Input Field For BotFather
text: Unfortunately, all attempts I've made to get BotFather to accept my commands have failed. On the web app, I get an error that I need to be Admin to send commands to BotFather when I click on the BitFather command links. On desktop and mobile, there are no links and no reply feature. Opening the context menu shows all but "Reply". It's been a nightmare trying to find a similar problem in tech forums and this is prolly my last attempt to find a solution to this. I'm trying here to see if the developer can provide some support before I abandon the entire idea.

title: Great app, but
text:
Really wish we could deactivate/remove some of the new features. Some UI changes are imposed and you can‚Äôt get rid of them. Very specifically the Story feature which I just don‚Äôt care about and it‚Äôs annoying swiping and accidentally switching to the camera app for it, or accidentally opening a friend‚Äôs Story, or have Telegram‚Äôs present and always taking up space. 

Please just give us the option to turn stuff off.

title: Suggestion, An important one
text: Please please your program is more than great but if you add two features I will move from w‚ÄôsUp to you officially and move others with me: 1.An option to hide ‚Äùread‚Äù status for the messages. 2.An option to hide ‚Äùonline‚Äù state so we can do our work silently without an interrupt from others, you know this is strongly important and what we all wish when we discuss about social apps. Thank you BestApp!

title: sort of freely
text:
This is a great app I believe ,many channels depending who you follow are letting you speak freely but to a certain point.

You will get suspended if you use certain left wing feeling hurting terms and many channels wont let you post comments .
If you speak against certain left wing topics you will be blocked from existence just like you tube,fb, twitter etc . 

Many sensitive individuals are flooding this app that at times it may feel that you are still in facebook or twitter or even you tube but if you can just ignore them from existence and focus on your favorite person or persons to get your news and chat with friends you will love this app .

Over all app is fun to have and there are many informative channels in telegram that you will enjoy following till mysteriously they are gone !

title: They say nothing can be perfect but it‚Äôs a lie
text:
Telegram is 99% perfect and there is one thing you need to fix to make impossible possible. Can you please give us back an opportunity to choose photos from phone albums as it used to be several updates ago? It‚Äôs more convenient to select pics from my favorites or any other folder than to scroll allllllll gallery in aim to find a necessary one ü•π

Will appreciate from all my heart üíõ

title: Calling
text: The texting on this app is great but when it comes to calling it‚Äôs not so great and could use some work. The calls either don‚Äôt go through, sends me a notification of an incoming call but shows the actual call coming through a whole minute later, or the call doesn‚Äôt come through at all but I still get a notification and it makes my screen freeze for a few seconds. I have an iPhone btw. I used this app for two days but uninstalled it and went back to WhatsApp because of the calling feature.

title: Great but has bugs
text: I‚Äôve been using telegram for a couple of years now. My friends and I find it really convenient and user-friendly. The only problem is that it is filtered in Iran, and it has some bugs when used with VPN. For example, it doesn‚Äôt show notifications, which is quite a serious bug in my opinion. It sometimes crashes too. I hope the creators read this and fix the bugs. üíï

title: App with worst security ever!
text: I have two  Two-Factor authentication but my profile was hacked. I can‚Äôt access it because it says ‚Äú too many attempts‚Äù and I need to wait 24 hours. Hackers spam recovery again in 24 hours so I can‚Äôt login again. They are sending messages to all my contacts. I‚Äôve sent multiple mails to Telegram support but nobody answers. I can‚Äôt delete my account and hackers use it normally. I don‚Äôt understand why don‚Äôt you freeze account or something if someone is spamming recovery? And how can someone without my phone number access and my email access get my account? Your support is terrible!

title: Being able to "like" messages would be nice
text: Great group messaging app, especially now that you can create polls for people to vote on and can have invite links to the group. My biggest issue with it is not being able to like/react to a message. It can be annoying having a bunch of messages rolling in just indicating that someone has seen the message. This is a feature that GroupMe and Facebook Messenger have that I really appreciate.

title: Not taking action for Pornographic channels
text: There are obviously so many pornographic channels in telegram, which includes pedophilic contents. Those channels are using anonymous and secure features of telegram for their distribution. Although there have been so many reports to those disturbing contents, still  telegram doesn‚Äôt take any action and letting those child porns distributed and this is really disgusting. you guys should work on that.

title: The premium
text:
Frankly and honestly, telegram has been helping in in medical school since six years. I was so proud happy highly enthusiastic about the every new change l. It benefits in in millions of things ‚Ä¶ hoo hayyyy telegram .
BIT recently when they add the premium and we can not allow many features with pit subscribe WHY just WHY

This is unbelievable. I love telegram cuz it provided me every I can do helped me in dozens countless of time ! Now requires premium! This is really really no exaggerating upsetting making you feel like poor powerless

title: Telegram needs an end to end encrypted
text: If telegram wants to make it to the top as the number one social media app and surpass whatsapp it needs an end to end encryption on their chats whether group or private chats. This is one chat function that shouldn‚Äôt make one to be going through processes to set on the app, it can make someone to look down on you if you are to request for end to end encryption when you want to have a chat with someone. So you developers should please make it a default function.

title: Non-exsistent customer service!
text:
Although I used to really enjoy using this app, suddenly since the last update, many features, such as stickers no longer work. I went to telegram‚Äôs official site, followed their directions exactly, no change. Tried to talk to someone for help, but all they have are ‚Äúvolunteers‚Äù, who are functionally and universally useless in their advice. Not happy, it seems as though the folks who developed this app really don‚Äôt care about its users.

(If you‚Äôre from Telegram, don‚Äôt bother commenting on this post, I‚Äôm already gone and don‚Äôt appreciate empty platitudes.)

title: Needs favourite messages per chat to be perfect.
text:
I love Telegram and ditched whatsapp for it. 
The only thing I miss from Whatsapp is the option to mark favourite messages inside a chat. Telegram has the Saved Messages folder which is great and I use it. But would be better if we could also mark favourites inside a chat. Or maybe filter in Saved Messages folder by chat the message came from. 
Adding Status I guess wouldn‚Äôt hurt either. 
Thanks.
